parameters.description: The maximum distance between points internally when generating the path

parameters.description: The maximum twist DX value allowed when generating points along the spline
parameters.name: kMaxDX

parameters.description: The maximum twist DY value allowed when generating points along the spline

parameters.description: The maximum twist DTheta value allowed when generating points along the spline
parameters.name: kMaxDTheta
